vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_4.sol#26-34):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_4.sol#31)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_am) (patch_4.sol#32)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancy_lock (patch_4.sol#33)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_4.sol#18-24):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_4.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_4.sol#22)

external-function

solc-version
